quotes.author: Oogwayaaa
quotes.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.

quotes.author: Azim Axmedov
quotes.quote: It was quite awesome task! I hope my code is awesome too)

quotes.author: Master Shifu
quotes.quote: Your story may not have such a happy beginning but that does not make you who you are, it is the rest of it- who you choose to be

quotes.author: Master Oogway
quotes.quote: Your mind is like this water, my friend. When it is agitated, it becomes difficult to see. But if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear

quotes.author: Master Oogway
quotes.quote: You are too concerned with what was and what will be. There’s a saying; Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present

quotes.author: Master Shifu
quotes.quote: The measure of a real champion is not whether they can triumph, but whether they can overcome defeat

quotes.author: Master Oogway
quotes.quote: To make something special you just have to believe it’s special
